definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以選五花肉或瘦肉，中國的漢堡不輸麥當勞。

sentences.english: The demand for circumcision seems to have caught everybody off guard.
sentences.chinese: 割包皮的要求似乎將每個人都拽回了警戒線內。

sentences.english: During the bris, the baby boy is circumcised.
sentences.chinese: 在生物研究所，男孩被割包皮了。

sentences.english: We want to protect our men against the risk of HIV transmission by circumcising them.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望，通過割包皮來保護男人不要感染艾滋。

sentences.english: It turns out, circumcision really is a big deal.
sentences.chinese: 事實證明，割包皮真的是一個大問題。

definition: popular Taiwan snack, similar to a hamburger, steamed bun stuffed with pork, pickled vegetables, peanut powder and cilantro
soft mixed vegetable and meat roll-up
pineapple cake, traditional Taiwanese sweet pastry
crumb (soft interior of a loaf of bread)
